top_comments.comment:
A HUGE thanks to Drew and Linda Scott for helping design the interior of my new home! Go follow them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/athome. 

Would you like to see any other videos of the house? I can show whats in my fridge, pantry, Mike's Office, and more! Let me know

comments_since_last_sample.body: I think youshoul name her Katie
I love Ro’s videos! She teaches me SO MUCH about cooking & crazy videos! I think you should name the Barista “ Barbara The Barista “ I love your vids Ro, your crew and yourself work so hard 💖💖💖
The doggie crate looks like a prison and maybe you could dress coconut and blueberry as prisoners.
The bathroom is triple my bedroom size
Hey, Ro. Just a quick question because you and Patrick most likely didn't know. Is it white Sage? Or regular sage?
What a gorgeous, light-filled, tasteful home!

I really wish I could meet miss Rosanna! 
I love you miss Rosanna Pansino ❤️

ummm...

her bathroom is double the size of my shared bedroom 🤣
I've been watching Ro for years and it's nice to see her achieve so much, love you Ro ❤️

The barista's name:     

DRUM ROLL PLEASE...........

Diane

Gaah dayum, this house is absolutely beautiful and massive & I've never seen a kitchen island that big! Wowwiee. This house is huge but definitely radiates the same energy as you and I love that. You've certainly made it your home! Also that bathroom is literally bigger than my enitire house. 😂 It's so crazy to see how far you've come in your YouTube journey, this is certainly a family home and/or a good home for gatherings like you said. I also just love the flow of the place and how organized and just beautifully picked out each piece is that matches with all the colours and the vibes of the place. Can't wait to see more content from this beautiful place!
